name: Dreaming of Broadway Quiz | Musicals Mixture | 10 Questions

questions.text: In "Annie" this character sings of parents in the song "Maybe".
questions.explanation:
Annie.

	The original Annie was played by Andrea McArdle. Her daughter later played Young Cosette in the musical "Les Miserables".

questions.text: In "Gypsy" this character told her father "88 bucks is all that I need". Who had this $88 dream?
questions.explanation:
Rose.

	The real Gypsy Rose Lee's sister is actress June Havoc.

questions.text: In "Joseph and the Amazing Technicolor Dreamcoat" this person dreamt he saw "eleven stars bowing down to mine".
questions.explanation:
Joseph.

	"Joseph..." was originally written as a one-hour show for an all-boys school in England.

questions.text: Also in "Joseph and the Amazing Technicolor Dreamcoat" a person dreams of seven skinny cows eating seven fat cows, but not gaining any weight. Who had this dream?
questions.explanation:
Pharaoh.

	The Pharaoh was made to look like Elvis Presley, the big music icon of the 1960s.

questions.text: In "Man of La Mancha" this man dreamed "the impossible dream".
questions.explanation:
Don Quixote.

	The music for "Man of La Mancha" was written by Mitch Leigh. The lyrics were written by Joe Darion.

questions.text: This song is actually a ballet performed in "The Mystery of Edwin Drood". The title would give the answer away; however, this character was an opium addict and dreamt he killed Edwin Drood.
questions.explanation:
John Jasper.

	"The Mystery of Edwin Drood" was the last novel Charles Dickens ever wrote. He died before it was complete, so the audience votes on the ending in the musical.

questions.text: Who sings, "I Dreamed a Dream" in Les Miserables?
questions.explanation:
Fantine.

	"Les Miserables in Concert" features Jean Valjeans from all over the world.

questions.text: This person from "The Secret Garden" dreamed of a "round-shouldered man". Who is he?
questions.explanation:
Colin.

	As of October 9, 2004, Daisy Eagan is the youngest person to ever win a Tony for best actress in a musical. She played Mary Lennox.

questions.text: Who sings "I dreamed I met a Galilean" in "Jesus Christ Superstar"?
questions.explanation:
Pilate.

	Orignally "Jesus Christ Superstar" was only a record album.

questions.text: Which gambler from "Guys and Dolls" sings "I dreamed I got on the boat to heaven and by some chance I had brought my dice along?"
questions.explanation:
Nicely - Nicely Johnson.

	According to www.musicalheaven.com, between 1951 and 1992 "Guys and Dolls" had won 15 Tony Awards.
